topic: How to deploy microservices using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to deploy microservices using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Deploying Microservices Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer provides a step-by-step guide on how to deploy microservices using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: Deploying to production using Uvicorn and Docker

code_examples.code:
FROM python:3.12
WORKDIR /app
COPY . /app
RUN pip install fastapi uvicorn
CMD ["uvicorn", "main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "80"]

version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for this tutorial.
Uvicorn ASGI server is recommended for deployment in FastAPI projects.
caveats: Ensure you have Docker installed and running on your system.
You should understand the basics of microservices architecture before proceeding with this tutorial.
